Hence, there is a null-pointer-dereference bug at line 31.], [Trace: (Line 29, is_null(data)), (Line 31, is_null(data))]

- Bug 3, [Explanation: In the file CWE476_NULL_Pointer_Dereference__Integer_71a.java, the variable data at line 57 is assigned with a null value.
